name: Fly Decó Hotel
address: Lungomare P. Toscanelli, 52a, 00122 Lido di Ostia, Rome
description: Facing the beachfront, Fly Decó Hotel offers 4-star accommodation in Lido di Ostia and features a garden, terrace and bar. The property is located a few steps from Ostia Lido Beach, 2.4 km from Castel Fusano Beach and 19 km from Zoo Marine. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. A continental, Italian or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. EUR Magliana Metro Station is 21 km from Fly Decó Hotel, while PalaLottomatica Arena is 22 km away. The nearest airport is Fiumicino Airport, 11 km from the accommodation.

name: Villa Vietnamonamour
description: Villa Vietnamonamour is located in Milan, just a 5-minute walk from Zara Metro Station. Offering free Wi-Fi throughout, it features elegant Oriental-style rooms with air conditioning, and a typical restaurant. The colourful bedrooms have been decorated with design furnishings and attention to details. Each is provided with a flat-screen TV featuring satellite channels, and an en suite bathroom with hydromassage shower. The restaurant serves Vietnamese cuisine. Milan Cathedral is 5 km form the property, while Milan Malpensa Airport is a 40-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Palazzo Durazzo Suites
description: Hotel Palazzo Durazzo Suites is located in the centre of Genoa, 400 metres from University of Genoa. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is in front of the Old Port of Genoa. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Each room has a kettle, while selected rooms are fitted with a balcony and others also offer sea views. Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet, continental and Italian options. Hotel Palazzo Durazzo Suites offers 5-star accommodation with a sauna. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Gallery of the White Palace, Palazzo Rosso and Palazzo Doria Tursi. The nearest airport is Genoa Cristoforo Colombo Airport, 10 km from Hotel Palazzo Durazzo Suites.

name: B&B dell'Acquario
address: Via Di Sottoripa Civico 1A, 16128 Genoa, Genoa
description: Unique accommodation with free Wi-Fi and exposed-stone walls are offered at B&B dell’Acquario, in central Genova. You will be just around the corner from the harbour and 400 metres from San Giorgio Metro Station. Set in three 17th-century buildings, the bed and breakfast offers both bright and colourful rooms and apartments, located within 200 metres of Genoa Aquarium. Rooms comes with air conditioning, a sofa and flat-screen TV. Apartments all include a kitchenette and daily cleaning services. A varied breakfast with fresh fruit and Ligurian pastries is available daily directly in your room or apartment. You can also enjoy disocunted rates at various restaurants in the city. Acquario B&B is 600 metres from the San Lorenzo Cathedral and a 10-minute walk from the main square, Piazza Ferrari.

name: Hotel Galles
description: Hotel La Superba is located in the centre of Genoa, and offers a view of the beautiful Piazza del Principe square. It is also very near the cruise ship and ferries harbour at the Ponte dei Mille. The rooms come with elegant parquet floors. All rooms have Wi-Fi access, TV and air conditioning. A generous breakfast is served every morning. The Galles Hotel is 600 metres from Genoa's Aquarium and 900 metres from the Cotone Congress Centre. The nearest train station is Genova Porta Principe.

name: Carnival Palace Hotel
description: Carnival Palace is a brand-new hotel offering ultra-modern rooms with wood floors and free Wi-Fi. Set in Venice's Jewish Ghetto area, it is 10 metres from the Tre Archi Vaporetto water bus stop. Rooms are soundproofed and come with an advanced air ventilation system. You will also have a TV, minibar and en suite bathroom with hairdryer. A full American breakfast is served each morning and can be enjoyed out in the garden in summer. Carnival Palace Hotel is less than 10 minutes' walk from Venice Santa Lucia Train Station. It is well connected to St. Mark's Square by the Vaporetto water bus lines 5.1, 5.2, and 4.2.

name: Hotel Ca' d'Oro
description: Hotel Ca' D'Oro is a 5-minute walk from Venice’s Rialto Bridge and features a roof terrace where guests can enjoy afternoon tea. It offers canal views and traditionally furnished rooms. The Ca' D'Oro’s rooms are air conditioned and come with a minibar and satellite TV. Some have views of the Rio di Ca' Dolce canal. A daily buffet breakfast is provided, including coffee with ham, cheese and pastries. The attentive staff can provide recommendations for the many traditional restaurants in the Cannaregio area. Guests can enjoy free tickets for the Municipal Casino. The Ca’ D’Oro vaporetto water bus stop is 200 metres from the hotel.

name: Ruzzini Palace Hotel
description: Ruzzini Palace Hotel is set in Campo Santa Maria Formosa, one of Venice's largest and oldest squares. This historic building has beautiful décor and is 10 minutes' walk from Rialto. The Ruzzini has been completely renovated and all rooms are comfortable and spacious. They have typical décor, flat-screen satellite TV and minibars. Staff at Ruzzini Palace are friendly and professional. A delicious breakfast is provided and the hotel has its own bar, lounge and internet point. You will have excellent transport links at Ruzzini Palace Hotel. Water taxis stop right at the hotel.

name: Locanda Vivaldi
description: Just 5 minutes' walk from Saint Mark's Square, Locanda Vivaldi offers a rooftop terrace with views across Venice's Lagoon. Accommodation is air conditioned, and Wi-Fi is free throughout. Rooms at the Locanda include satellite TV, a minibar, and private bathroom with hairdryer plus toiletries. Some rooms feature ceilings, a spa bath, or a balcony. Some rooms overlook St. Mark’s Basin. A continental breakfast is provided. The summer rooftop restaurant specialises in traditional sea food dishes for dinner. The property has its own private dock and is about 100 metres from the San Zaccaria Vaporetto water bus stop, linking with Venezia Santa Lucia Station.

name: Hotel Panorama
address: Piazzale Santa Maria Elisabetta 1, 30126 Venice, Veneto
description: Hotel Panorama is located on Lido's waterfront, with a splendid view of the Lagoon and just opposite the water-bus stop for Venice. Rooms are elegant, bright, and cosy. WiFi is free. Panorama Hotel features a sun terrace, where drinks are served in spring and summer. The breakfast buffet includes croissants, cereals, packed jams and fresh fruit. The Panorama's friendly staff will be glad to suggest the best itineraries and ways to enjoy a unique Venetian stay.

name: Pesaro Palace
address: Cannaregio 3935, Calle Ca' d'Oro, 30121 Venice, Veneto
description: Set in a 15th-century building on the Grand Canal, Pesaro Palace is next to the Ca' d'Oro water bus stop. It offers Venetian-style rooms with free Wi-Fi, air conditioning and flat-screen TV. Rooms are decorated with classic furniture and Murano glass lamps. Each comes with a minibar, carpeted floors and bathroom with hairdryer. Some overlook the Grand Canal. A sweet and savoury buffet breakfast is served in the breakfast hall, and includes eggs, bacon and cold cuts, but also cakes and biscuits. Saint Mark's Square can be reached in less than 15 minutes by foot or Vaporetto. Rialto Bridge is 5 minutes' walk away, while Santa Lucia Train Station is 1 km away. The Pesaro hotel includes an internal courtyard and a 50-m² garden with tables and chairs. The reception is open 24 hours a day, and the lobby is decorated with antique furnishings.

name: Hotel Palazzo Stern
description: Featuring a terrace and rooftop hot tub on the Grand Canal. Staff at Hotel Palazzo Stern are always available and can organise excursions, tours and tickets. The building still has many original frescoes and mosaics. Rooms are traditionally decorated and some have canal views. Each comes with free Wi-Fi, an espresso coffee maker, and slippers. A la carte breakfast is available daily. The Ca’ Rezzonico vaporetto waterbus stop is next to the hotel. St. Mark's Square is a 10-minute walk away, across the Accademia Bridge.

name: Hotel Ca' Formenta
description: Hotel Ca' Formenta features a private wharf, and is located in Via Garibaldi, one block from the Venice Biennale, and 10 minutes' walk from St. Mark’s Square. Rooms are furnished in a typical Venetian style, with blue carpets, yellow wallpaper, and white custom-made furniture. All rooms offer a marble bathroom with bath or shower, air conditioning, and a flat-screen TV. Some rooms enjoy a breathtaking view of the lagoon. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. The Ca' Formenta serves a generous breakfast buffet, from 07:30 to 10:00. During summer, you can enjoy it on one of the 2 tables in front of the hotel, with charming views of Venice.

name: Honeymoon suite on Grand Canal
description: Boasting a garden, terrace and views of sea, Honeymoon suite on Grand Canal is situated in Venice, a few steps from Scuola Grande di San Rocco. The property is located 200 metres from Venice Santa Lucia Train Station, 10 km from M9 Museum and 13 km from Mestre Ospedale Train Station. The property is a few steps from Frari Basilica, and within 600 metres of the city centre. All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a microwave, a coffee machine, a walk-in shower, a hair dryer and a desk. Featuring a private bathroom with a bidet and free toiletries, rooms at the guest house also boast free WiFi. At Honeymoon suite on Grand Canal rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. PadovaFiere is 39 km from the accommodation, while Gran Teatro Geox is 46 km from the property. The nearest airport is Venice Marco Polo Airport, 13 km from Honeymoon suite on Grand Canal.

name: Ca' Mazzega
description: Just 15 metres from the Venier vaporetto waterbus stop on Murano Island, Ca’ Mazzega Murano Grand Canal view apartments offers elegant apartments with canal views and a fully equipped kitchenette with dishwasher. Free WiFi is provided in the entire property. Featuring a private garden, all air-conditioned apartments offer a flat-screen TV, a living/dining area, and a bathroom with washing machine and hairdryer. In the summer, guests can enjoy meals in the furnished private garden. Water buses to/from Venice and Santa Lucia Train Station leave from the pier right opposite Ca’ Mazzega. The apartments are set in a pedestrian-only area, at a walking distance from the island’s Murano glass factories and shops. The Murano Glass Museum is less than a 10-minute walk away.

name: Collegio Amdg
address: Cannaregio 4885 Campo dei gesuiti, 30121 Venice, Veneto
description: Conveniently located in the Cannaregio district of Venice, Collegio AMDG is set 600 metres from Ca' d'Oro, less than 1 km from Rialto Bridge and a 16-minute walk from Basilica San Marco. Featuring a garden, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers room service and luggage storage space for guests. At the hotel, the rooms come with a wardrobe. All rooms are fitted with a desk and a flat-screen TV, and some units at Collegio AMDG have a balcony. Italian and vegan breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Collegio AMDG include Piazza San Marco, Doge's Palace and La Fenice Theatre. The nearest airport is Venice Marco Polo Airport, 18 km from the hotel.

name: Gardena Hotel
description: Hotel Gardena is set in the university and museum district, next to Papadopoli Gardens and a 5-minute walk from Santa LuciaTrain Station. Enjoy a delicious breakfast buffet in the courtyard. All rooms come with air conditioning, a private bathroom with bath or shower, and a TV. Some rooms offer antique furniture and unique views of Venice's rooftops or a canal. The lobby greets you with unique frescoes. You will find an interesting collection of period furniture and elegant fixtures throughout the hotel. There are plenty of places to relax including the hall, TV lounge, and coffee bar. Your day at the Gardena Hotel begins with a varied breakfast out in the courtyard, full of fresh ingredients, and available from Monday to Saturday 07:30 until 10:00, and Sunday from 08:00 until 10:30. The friendly team of staff are always on hand and can share valuable local knowledge and tourist tips. Ask them about a discount at a nearby garage if you are arriving by car.

name: Boutique Bnb Dolcevita
address: Piazza Tredici Vittime 48 3. Piano, 90133 Palermo, Sicily
description: Located in Palermo, 1.1 km from Fontana Pretoria and 600 metres from the centre, Boutique BnB Dolcevita provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a shared lounge. All units come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with a hair dryer, walk-in shower and bidet. A fridge is also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. The bed and breakfast provides a housekeeping service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Popular points of interest near Boutique BnB Dolcevita include Palermo Cathedral, Teatro Politeama Palermo and Piazza Castelnuovo. The nearest airport is Falcone-Borsellino, 28 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Unìco Boutique Hotel D'arte
address: Via Piano Di Gallo 36, 90151 Palermo, Sicily
description: Unìco Boutique Hotel d'Arte offers accommodation with free WiFi in Mondello, attractively located 450 metres from Lido di Mondello. A hot tub and a bicycle rental service are available for guests. The hotel provides a shared lounge. At the hotel, rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Each room comes with air conditioning, and certain rooms at Unìco Boutique Hotel d'Arte have a terrace. Guest rooms have a wardrobe. A continental breakfast is served every morning at the property or, upon request, in the comfort of your room. The accommodation offers an infinity pool set in the garden and a small hidromassage pool set on the outdoor terrace area. Cycling is among the activities that guests can enjoy near Unìco Boutique Hotel d'Arte. Languages spoken at the reception include German, English and Spanish. Falcone-Borsellino Airport is 25 km away.

name: L' Hôtellerie Easy Suites
description: Located in the historical centre Palermo and set in a 16th-century building, L' Hôtellerie B&B features accommodation with free WiFi. This property also has a rooftop sea-view terrace with a small outdoor pool. Rooms at the L' Hôtellerie B&B offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a hairdryer and bidet. L' Hôtellerie B&B offers a continental, buffet-style breakfast. Foro Italico - Palermo is a 3-minute walk from L' Hôtellerie B&B. Falcone-Borsellino Airport is 25 km from the property.

name: Location10
description: Located in Palermo, 1.2 km from Fontana Pretoria and 600 metres from the centre, Location10 provides air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a terrace. The bed and breakfast offers a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with slippers, a hair dryer and bidet. There is also a fridge, minibar and a kettle. The daily breakfast offers continental, Italian or vegetarian options. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area. Popular points of interest near Location10 include Palermo Cathedral, Teatro Politeama Palermo and Piazza Castelnuovo. The nearest airport is Falcone-Borsellino, 28 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Addaura Village e Congressi
description: Located just 150 metres from the sea in Palermo, Addaura Village e Congressi is near Mondello bay. It offers an outdoor swimming pool (swimming caps are mandatory), and air-conditioned rooms and apartments. Rooms at Hotel Addaura come with a minibar, TV, and safe. Many have a sea view. Palermo's port and historic centre are around 10 km away. The hotel is easily reached from the A29 motorway.

name: Maison Butera Luxury Suite
description: No description found

name: Hotel Nettuno
address: Viale Ruggero di Lauria 121, 95126 Catania, Sicily
description: Set along Catania's promenade, Hotel Nettuno features an outdoor pool and a sun terrace with views of the sea furnished with deck chairs and parasols. Air-conditioned rooms at the Nettuno are equipped with free pay TV, free WiFi and a private bathroom. Some rooms come with a balcony overlooking the Ionian Sea or Mount Etna. During the day, guests can enjoy snacks, cocktails and long drinks in the Lounge Bar. Several restaurants, bars and pizzerias are located in the city centre, 1 km away. Hotel Nettuno located just 1.5 km from Le Ciminiere convention centre and Catania Train and Bus Station. Fontanarossa International Airport is 8 km away.

name: CasaVostra al Parco
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a rainfall showerhead and a refrigerator, as well as a stovetop and free WiFi. Other amenities include premium bedding, a pillowtop bed, down comforters, and laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Catania Hills Residence
description: No description found

name: 4 Spa Resort Hotel
description: Situated on the road between Acicastello and Catania, 4 Spa Resort Hotel features a large paid spa, wellness centre and indoor pool, a free seasonal outdoor pool and a restaurant. Parking and Wi-Fi are free. Featuring air conditioning, the rooms come with a satellite flat-screen TV and minibar. A continental breakfast is served buffet style. The hotel’s restaurant offers regional specialties for lunch and dinner. In summer, they can be enjoyed near the pool. You can relax in Spa Luxury Beauty, one of the largest spa and wellness centres in Southern Italy, providing many services such as a Turkish bath, Finnish sauna and massages. This 4-star property also has its paid fitness centre with indoor pool and a top-quality medical clinic, dermatology and dietary services. Resort Hotel 4 Spa is 12 km from Catania Airport.

name: Four Points by Sheraton Catania Hotel and Conference Center
address: Via Antonello da Messina 45, Aci Castello, 95021 Catania, Sicily
description: Where You Want to Be. Blue skies and smiling faces greet you at the Four Points by Sheraton Catania Hotel and Conference Center, located on the breathtaking Cyclops Coast. Stroll across the street to the rocky beach and admire beautiful views. Visit Catania's celebrated sites, just 6 miles away and explore the rich history of Acireale and Taormina, at the foot of Mount Etna. This place offers the perfect combination of local hospitality, art and enviroinment. At the fON Art Gallery, art reigns supreme thanks to the great job of Fondazione Oelle. Fully accessible to all, even people with reduced mobility, the hotel offers 166 guest rooms and suites and all the amenities to enjoy your sicilian journey. After a full day, recharge in the fitness center, in the tennis court, in the wellness and beauty area of Arantia Rubra, take a dip by the pool or by the sea deck or dine surrounded by lemon trees sitting on the Chef's Table of our Horto Vegetable Garden for a unique taste experienceMarriott

name: B&B Policlinico Gaspare Rodolico
description: Featuring mountain views and a terrace, B&B Policlinico Gaspare Rodolico features accommodation ideally set in Catania, within a short distance of Stadio Angelo Massimino. Free WiFi is offeredthroughout the property. Fitted with a balcony, the units offer air conditioning and feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bidet and a hair dryer. For added convenience, the property can provide towels and linens for a supplement. An Italian breakfast is available each morning at the bed and breakfast. B&B Policlinico Gaspare Rodolico provides a housekeeping service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Catania Piazza Duomo is 5.3 km from the accommodation, while Taormina Cable Car - Mazzaro Station is 49 km from the property. The nearest airport is Catania Fontanarossa, 9 km from B&B Policlinico Gaspare Rodolico, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Sicilia's Residence Hotel Art & Spa
address: Via Dei Tigli, 1 Collina di Acitrezza, 95122 Catania, Sicily
description: No description found

name: Hotel Regina Margherita
description: Set in Cagliari’s historic centre, Hotel Regina Margherita features modern rooms with satellite TV and a hydromassage shower or bath. The adjacent garage is available free of charge. All air conditioned, rooms have free WiFi, contemporary furnishings and carpeted floors. They include a minibar and a hairdryer. The Regina Margherita is surrounded by restaurants, bars and shops. Cagliari Cathedral and the harbour are a 10-minute walk away.

name: Quarzo. Modern Rooms
description: Quarzo. Modern Rooms is set in Cagliari, within 37 km of Nora and 3.2 km of Sardinia International Fair. This property is situated a short distance from attractions such as Orto Botanico di Cagliari, Church of Saint Michael, and Cagliari Railway Station. The property is allergy-free and is located 2.9 km from Spiaggia di Giorgino. At the guest house each room comes with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, bathrobes and a hair dryer. Free WiFi is available to all guests, while certain rooms include a terrace. At Quarzo. Modern Rooms all rooms have bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include National Archaeological Museum of Cagliari, Church of Saint Ephysius and Piazza Yenne. The nearest airport is Cagliari Elmas Airport, 9 km from Quarzo. Modern Rooms.

name: Grande Albergo Delle Nazioni
description: Right on the seafront, Grande Albergo Delle Nazioni features a heated outdoor pool, a gourmet restaurant, and a spacious terrace with sea views. Rooms are modern and air conditioned, and Wi-Fi is free throughout. The rooms are spacious, elegant and fitted with parquet floors, and they all feature a light-blue marine décor, as well as en suite bathrooms. Some rooms also have sea views. At Grande Albergo Delle Nazioni you can also unwind just by admiring the sea and city views from the spacious terrace. Breakfast is served daily in the dining room, and it includes sweet and savoury products. The top-floor restaurant, Ristorante La Terrazza, offers panoramic views and international and Mediterranean cuisine. Bari Centrale Train Station is just 1 km from the hotel. Basilica di San Nicola cathedral is a 20-minute walk away.

name: The Britannique Naples, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Britannique Hotel Naples, Curio Collection by Hilton is a sophisticated boutique hotel located in the heart of fashionable Chiaia district. Nestled along the northern coast of Naples Bay, a castle and Posillipo hill, our hotel boasts incredible views from every angle. Take a step inside our storied hotel and marvel at the burst of charm and modern flair. From the moment you walk into our grand lobby, you’ll journey through the city’s intimate antiquity. Each floor of our coveted hotel features different colors inspired by Naples stratigraphy. Some guest rooms have artisanal artwork honoring the six myths of Naples. Take comfort in beautifully decorated and colorful guest rooms that feature plush bedding, free WiFi access, in-room coffee and tea – with several overlooking Naples Bay. Choose a suite for added features like a separate living room, minibars, and residence-like amenities. Start your morning over an exquisite international breakfast buffet at Le Paviillon, a gorgeous restaurant encased in a glasshouse. Savor fine Italian dining from our rooftop restaurant, The Macphersons, or retreat to The Niq Bar as the sun sets and enjoy floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking the water. Built in 1870, the fully renovated hotel stays true to its original facade, while weaving in contemporary design elements like a roof completely enclosed with windows. Treat yourself to our outdoor terrace and solarium, fitness center, spa, and cigar room while you stay with us.Hilton

name: J44 Lifestyle Hotel
description: Situated in Lido di Jesolo, 100 metres from Lido di Jesolo, J44 Lifestyle Hotel features accommodation with free bikes, private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. Each accommodation at the 5-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a shared lounge and to a terrace. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. All rooms have a wardrobe. The daily breakfast offers buffet, à la carte or continental options. At J44 Lifestyle Hotel you will find a restaurant serving Italian, Mediterranean and Seafood cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. You can play tennis at the accommodation, and the area is popular for cycling. Caribe Bay is 4.5 km from J44 Lifestyle Hotel, while Caorle Archaeological Sea Museum is 25 km from the property. The nearest airport is Venice Marco Polo Airport, 32 km from the hotel.

name: Grand Hotel Vesuvio
description: Located right on the seafront, the prestigious Grand Hotel Vesuvio overlooks the Gulf of Naples, the island of Capri and Mount Vesuvius. This hotel features a luxury indoor pool, fitness centre with personal trainer and a wellness area with hot tub, sauna and steam bath. From April to October, the Wonderful Sky Lounge Solarium & Cocktail Bar has full views of Gulf of Naples. Rooms are spacious and elegantly decorated. All air-conditioned, they also feature a minibar and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some have a balcony with sea views. The Vesuvio Grand Hotel serves a varied buffet breakfast each morning. The Caruso Roof Garden Restaurant on the 9th floor offers classic Italian cuisine and panoramic views across the Mediterranean Sea. The hotel is opposite the Castel dell'Ovo in the historic quarter of Santa Lucia. The port for boats to Capri, Sorrento and other destinations is 15 minutes' walk away.

name: La Plage Resort
description: Overlooking the Ionian Sea, La Plage Resort is set directly on its free private beach, within the Isola Bella Nature Reserve. It features modern rooms and bungalows with garden or sea views. The cable way to the historic centre of Taormina is a 10-minute walk away. All accommodation comes with a modern design, air conditioning, and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. All rooms have a balcony or patio, and some bungalows offer a private garden with hot tub. The Fusion restaurant specialises in traditional Sicilian cuisine, made with genuine local products. The bar serves international cocktails and spirits. A sweet Italian breakfast is available daily. La Plage provides a variety of beauty treatments and an outdoor massage gazebo. Expure Spa is complete with Turkish bath, hydromassage showers and chromotherapy. Staff can organise excursions to Mount Etna Regional Park, a 45-minute drive away. Parking is free.

name: NH Collection Genova Marina
description: Enjoy your stay at the NH Collection Genova Marina, a stunning work of architecture that stands on stilt-like pillars over the old port of Genoa. The building, designed by Renzo Piano, is perfectly situated close to the harbor and the historic city center. Spend the day at the Aquarium and the Sea Museum or shop at the luxury designer shops on Via Roma, all steps away from the hotel. NH Collection Genova Marina has 140 rooms, some of which come with private terraces with a view of the harbor. These contemporary spaces with light wood paneling are designed to ensure your comfort with rain-effect showers, pillow menus and coffee machines. During breakfast on our terrace, take in the view of the sea and the boats passing by. There is a wide selection of morning foods and made-to-order dishes. For lunch and dinner, Il Gozzo offers delicious Italian dishes that are created with fresh local ingredients. Enjoy these on the seafront terrace. Our Guest Relations team will be happy to arrange VIP tickets and reservations during your stay. There are gym facilities and private parking on site. 7 meeting rooms are available and there is free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.NH Hoteles

name: Grand Hotel La Favorita
description: Set in the centre of Sorrento and boasting a sun terrace and heated outdoor pool with views of the Gulf of Naples and Mount Vesuvius, Grand Hotel La Favorita offers accommodation with a balcony. Wi-Fi is free. Air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel La Favorita feature Vietri tiles, a satellite TV and minibar. The private bathroom comes with slippers, a hairdryer and free toiletries. An Italian buffet breakfast is provided daily. The à la carte restaurant specialises in Mediterranean dishes with typical products from Sorrento, while the bar serves snacks and a selection of cocktails. The 5-star hotel is located 1 km from Sorrento Harbour where guests can catch ferries to the island of Capri. Positano is a 30-minute drive away. When staying more than 2 nights, a welcome drink is offered.

name: Marina Place Resort
address: Via Pionieri e Aviatori d'Italia 129, 16154 Genoa, Genoa
description: Marina Place Resort is 1 km from Genoa's Cristoforo Colombo Airport. It offers air-conditioned rooms with modern décor and LCD satellite TV. Free parking is provided. Featuring contemporary furnishings, rooms provide free Wi-Fi. They also have a bathroom with hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. Some overlook the Marina. The hotel has a 24-hour reception, a gym and a wellness area with Turkish bath. Marina Place is 8 km from the centre of Genoa and 2.5 km from the A10 Motorway. Genova Cornigliano Train Station is 10 minutes away on foot.

name: Hotel Borgo Del Mare
description: Borgo Del Mare is a boutique hotel located 100 metres from the sea. It offers transfers to Civitavecchia Harbour and a restaurant serving traditional pizzas and Italian ice cream. All rooms are air conditioned and non smoking. They feature free Wi-Fi and an LCD TV with satellite and pay-per-view channels. Rooms set on the upper floors offer sea views. You have a good range of sweet and savoury items at the buffet breakfast, which includes a selection of freshly baked bread. Hotel Borgo Del Mare is less than 2 km from the centre and Civitavecchia Station. Trains leave regularly from here to Rome and the journey takes around one hour. Parking is available at the Borgo Del Mare Hotel. Staff are very informative and can arrange airport transfers.

name: Hotel Riviera & Maximilians
description: Set on the Coast of Trieste just 800 metres from the picturesque Miramare Castle and Grignano Bay, Hotel Riviera & Maximilian’s offers direct access to the beach between late May and mid September. The hotel features a panoramic wellness centre. All with sea views, modern rooms of Riviera & Maximilian's Hotel are set in a renovated building dating back to 1898, or in a new wing with large panoramic windows. A lift will take you directly to the beach. The panoramic restaurant, Le Terrazze, serves local specialities and fresh seafood. In summer, dinner is served out on the terrace at sunset. Guests can also book the access to a wellness centre, that includes a sauna and a Turkish bath. The historic centre of Trieste is 9 km away.

name: Hotel De La Ville
description: Hotel de La Ville is 200 metres from Civitavecchia Station, right next to the port for ferry departures to Sicily, Sardinia, and beyond. It offers free parking and air-conditioned rooms. Your room comes with satellite TV, Wi-Fi access, and a minibar. Set in a 19th-century building, the rooms have a classic décor. You can enjoy Italian cuisine at the De La Ville Hotel's restaurant. Its seafront location means you are close to the best shops and bars in Civitavecchia. Rome centre is easily reached by train in around one hour. The same train connects you to the most popular beaches along the coast.

name: The Pelican Beach Resort & Spa - Adults Only
description: The Pelican Beach Resort & SPA is an adult-only hotel set right by the sea between Olbia and Golfo Aranci on the north-east coast of Sardinia. It offers a garden, wellness centre and access to a sandy beach. It consists of 2 buildings, 1 a few steps from the beach and the other 60 metres away. The Pelican Beach Resort & SPA - Adults Only also features an outdoor pool, sunbathing area, and a restaurant with a spacious terrace overlooking the sea. Dining on the terrace is available on request. The outdoor fitness area has views of the Tavolara Island. Rooms come with satellite TV and air conditioning and some also have a private balcony with table and chairs. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. Scooters and cars can be rented at reception. Olbia is just 8 km away, while the airport and harbour can be reached in 15 minutes by car. Porto Cervo is approximately 30 km away.
